channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1458625057702531080
item.description:
Con la @UISEK y @worldcompl , abordamos la gestión en datos abiertos, ciberseguridad, simplificación de trámites y protección de datos.
El #GobiernoDelEncuentro, a través del Comité de Ciberseguridad y del Esquema Gubernamental de la Seguridad de la Información https://t.co/2XD4DkmQIW

item.title: #en @ 1458572070414012416
item.description: 9/ Also, because both protocols are decentralized, the vision of a truly open data market where anyone who wants to can monetize their node operator/indexer services independently for a lucrative living is also a very real possibility.

item.title: #fr @ 1458524772896288776
item.description:
“Tout code source obtenu ou développé par un organisme remplissant une mission de service public est considéré comme un document administratif, relevant des obligations de publication en open data.”
L’ouverture est encore loin d’être systématique, cette plateforme aidera.

item.title: #fr @ 1458522456784834566
item.description: @PhilippeMurer @MieuxVoter C'est quand même curieux tous ses informateurs qui ne s'informent pas et qui disent des bêtises à longueur de temps. Le financement de l'OMS et la part apportée par Bill Gates sont des données publiques.

item.description:
Here are some examples of what I am seeing daily now for the last week or so. These discrepancies never existed in the past. Today Hinshaw stated: 422 New cases 8 New deaths
AHS open data shows: 433 new cases 4 new deaths
I've been noticing errors in all data points. https://t.co/sngQur7AUY

item.title: #es @ 1458188026597806084
item.description: Me parece increíble que en 2021 una institución pública suba tablas en su sitio web en Word o PDFs de cientos o miles de hojas. ¿Qué clase de "open data" es esa? ¿Es intencional para hacer el trabajo más difícil a quienes utilizan datos públicos?

item.description:
A BD vai estar na LatinR 2021, Conferência Latinoamericana sobre uso de R em pesquisa e desenvolvimento.
Vamos participar da sessão Jornalismo de dados, dados abertos e visualização, que acontece dia 11, às 12h10!
➡️Se inscreva pelo link: https://t.co/eaSI5sEA1p

item.title: #en @ 1458088829882077193
item.description: We know there is a long way to go to get our rivers fit to swim in, but thanks to public pressure, sewer storm overflows are no longer the hidden secret they have been for years. Open data and citizen science will play a major role in holding govt and water companies to account https://t.co/MZ3S2d2Bjh

item.title: #de @ 1458082981227139073
item.description: Was passiert wenn politische Versprechen zu #OpenData auf die Verwaltungswirklichkeit treffen? Auf der Suche nach Erfolgsfaktoren besuchen wir vier Open-Data-Ökosysteme in London, Hamburg, Berlin und Wien. #twitterverwaltung #verwaltung https://t.co/eI3d6JJlFL

item.title: #en @ 1458013857763532801
item.description: New on #MENAdoc: Hidāya-i fārsī (4 volumes, Kolkata 1807-1808) https://t.co/c8lKTZi46n This legal Hanafi manual was printed in its Persian translation by British colonial authorities and played a key role in the standardisation in what came to be known as "Anglo-Muhammadan law". https://t.co/aucFLj7ofR

item.title: #en @ 1458004858225762304
item.description:

The #OpenData approach is very cool, too.
